title: Convert plain test case to Gherkin-style
pageHeader: [Test case conversion] Convert plain test case to Gherkin-style

prompt.expectations: Change test cases to BDD (Gherkin) format
prompt.examplePrompt:
For the next Text case need to change format to BDD

1) Precondition: Logged in as:
Employee
Resource Manager
RMs by hierarchy
HR
Delivery Manager (for their subordinates)
AM
Project Manager
IM coordinator

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open "Relocation and IM" tab.
2. Click "Start IM process" button.
3. Fill in mandatory fields and click "Save" button.
Expected result:
IMR full form is created.
prompt.sideEffectsOrComments:
Pros: 
- Helps to save much time after all the conditions are applied
- Tests can be downloaded as a Excel file and copied into the ChatGPT, so we can rework whole blocks of test
Cons: 
- Chat has some limits on input signs
Conclusion: Useful

assessment.comments: A good example about converting normal test cases to BDD style.

sampleData: PRECONDITIONS: Logged in as: Employee, Resource Manager, RMs by hierarchy, HR, Delivery Manager (for their subordinates), AM, Project Manager, IM coordinator

STEPS_TO_REPRODUCE: 1. Open 'Relocation and IM' tab.
2. Click 'Start IM process' button.
3. Fill in mandatory fields and click 'Save' button.
EXPECTED_RESULTS: IMR full form is created.
